    • toUniformUniform
    • toUniformUSampler
    • `==`Uniform

Static, efficient uniform representation. Uniform arrays are represented using a different enum discriminator, because then we don't have to allocate a seq each time.

Types

USampler = object
  textureTarget*: uint8
  textureId*, samplerId*: uint32
Meta-object for samplers. This is meant for internal use by the texture implementation, don't use this.   Source Edit 
UniformType = enum
  utFloat32, utInt32, utUint32, utVec2f, utVec2i, utVec2ui, utVec3f, utVec3i, utVec3ui,
  utVec4f, utVec4i, utVec4ui, utMat2f, utMat3f, utMat4f, utMat2x3f, utMat3x2f,
  utMat2x4f, utMat4x2f, utMat3x4f, utMat4x3f, utFloat32Array, utInt32Array,
  utUint32Array, utVec2fArray, utVec2iArray, utVec2uiArray, utVec3fArray,
  utVec3iArray, utVec3uiArray, utVec4fArray, utVec4iArray, utVec4uiArray,
  utMat2fArray, utMat3fArray, utMat4fArray, utMat2x3fArray, utMat3x2fArray,
  utMat2x4fArray, utMat4x2fArray, utMat3x4fArray, utMat4x3fArray, utUSampler
  Source Edit 
Uniform = object
  case ty*: UniformType
  of utFloat32:
    valFloat32*: float32
  of utInt32:
    valInt32*: int32
  of utUint32:
    valUint32*: uint32
  of utVec2f:
    valVec2f*: Vec2f
  of utVec2i:
    valVec2i*: Vec2i
  of utVec2ui:
    valVec2ui*: Vec2ui
  of utVec3f:
    valVec3f*: Vec3f
  of utVec3i:
    valVec3i*: Vec3i
  of utVec3ui:
    valVec3ui*: Vec3ui
  of utVec4f:
    valVec4f*: Vec4f
  of utVec4i:
    valVec4i*: Vec4i
  of utVec4ui:
    valVec4ui*: Vec4ui
  of utMat2f:
    valMat2f*: Mat2f
  of utMat3f:
    valMat3f*: Mat3f
  of utMat4f:
    valMat4f*: Mat4f
  of utMat2x3f:
    valMat2x3f*: Mat2x3f
  of utMat3x2f:
    valMat3x2f*: Mat3x2f
  of utMat2x4f:
    valMat2x4f*: Mat2x4f
  of utMat4x2f:
    valMat4x2f*: Mat4x2f
  of utMat3x4f:
    valMat3x4f*: Mat3x4f
  of utMat4x3f:
    valMat4x3f*: Mat4x3f
  of utFloat32Array:
    valFloat32Array*: seq[float32]
  of utInt32Array:
    valInt32Array*: seq[int32]
  of utUint32Array:
    valUint32Array*: seq[uint32]
  of utVec2fArray:
    valVec2fArray*: seq[Vec2f]
  of utVec2iArray:
    valVec2iArray*: seq[Vec2i]
  of utVec2uiArray:
    valVec2uiArray*: seq[Vec2ui]
  of utVec3fArray:
    valVec3fArray*: seq[Vec3f]
  of utVec3iArray:
    valVec3iArray*: seq[Vec3i]
  of utVec3uiArray:
    valVec3uiArray*: seq[Vec3ui]
  of utVec4fArray:
    valVec4fArray*: seq[Vec4f]
  of utVec4iArray:
    valVec4iArray*: seq[Vec4i]
  of utVec4uiArray:
    valVec4uiArray*: seq[Vec4ui]
  of utMat2fArray:
    valMat2fArray*: seq[Mat2f]
  of utMat3fArray:
    valMat3fArray*: seq[Mat3f]
  of utMat4fArray:
    valMat4fArray*: seq[Mat4f]
  of utMat2x3fArray:
    valMat2x3fArray*: seq[Mat2x3f]
  of utMat3x2fArray:
    valMat3x2fArray*: seq[Mat3x2f]
  of utMat2x4fArray:
    valMat2x4fArray*: seq[Mat2x4f]
  of utMat4x2fArray:
    valMat4x2fArray*: seq[Mat4x2f]
  of utMat3x4fArray:
    valMat3x4fArray*: seq[Mat3x4f]
  of utMat4x3fArray:
    valMat4x3fArray*: seq[Mat4x3f]
  of utUSampler:
    valUSampler*: USampler
  Source Edit

Consts

utArrays = {utFloat32Array, utInt32Array, utUint32Array, utVec2fArray, utVec2iArray,
          utVec2uiArray, utVec3fArray, utVec3iArray, utVec3uiArray, utVec4fArray,
          utVec4iArray, utVec4uiArray, utMat2fArray, utMat3fArray, utMat4fArray,
          utMat2x3fArray, utMat3x2fArray, utMat2x4fArray, utMat4x2fArray,
          utMat3x4fArray, utMat4x3fArray}
